review: I purchased the Chromecast to use from my hotel room when I travel.  Unfortunately, I did not realize at the time the Chromecast has no User Interface with which to accept the hotel's use policy.  This prevents me for connecting, configuring or using the Chromecast while traveling.At home it works fine, but it is a bit annoying having to use another device to "cast" the video to the Chromecast.

review: This was super easy to set up. It's wonderful for streaming.  I like looking at television as opposed to looking at my laptop, probably a generational thing. I have not had success viewing live/same time local channels so I purchased an antenna.  This combined with  Chromecast is much more cost efficient than cable or satellite television.
